description: A feeling of happiness, playfulness, or delight
A deep sense of sadness, grief, or loss
A sense of wonder or reverence in the face of something vast or beautiful
A warm feeling tied to accomplishment, growth, or connection
A tender ache for something or someone deeply loved or imagined
The sense of being protected, understood, and held in peace
The connective force of deep care, attachment, and presence
A signal of danger, vulnerability, or the unknown
A belief that something beautiful or meaningful is possible
An urge to explore, understand, or grow
